title: Congress to observe 'Black Day' today to protest rising crime against women
title_page: Congress to observe 'Black Day' today to protest rising crime against women - Worldnews.com
text:
The Congress will observe the Black Day across the nation today to protest rising crimes against women under the BJP rule in the country.
“Be it the case of a teenage victim in UP's Unnao or the story of Asifa, the eight-year-old girl in Kathua who was gang raped for seven days and then killed, the BJP has failed to
